body.p:
To His Excellency
Gov Bramlette of Kentucky
Sir
This petition would respectfully set forth.
That William Spencer a lad not of age yet is confined in the state Penitentiary for three years and six months for taking a pair of pants from a fellow boarder in the city of Covington
And your petitioner would pray for a pardon from your Excellency for him for the following reasons
Said William Spencer is a lad under twenty one years of age and this his first offence, was committed at the instigation of bad associates and because he was out of money and needed clothing

And your petitioner would further state that he has procured
honorable employment for said William Spencer provided this prayer should be granted, and will take him home with him to New York city where a situation is already waiting for him, and hopes by watchful care to restore him to his family and society again.
And your petitioner would further state that he is in a respectable business in New York City and is able to fulfil above conditions
Hoping for an early consideration of the above your petitioner would subscribe himself

Your most obedt & Humble Servt
Richard Areson
Firm of Halsted & Stiles
New York City
Frankfort Nov 24/65

Kenton Cir Ct
vs
Wm Spencer
3 yrs & 6 mos term 1865
Pardoned 2nd Dec/65
